APHont Installation Instructions


Install on Mac OS X
-------------------

Double-click each of four font files: Bold, Bold Italic, Italic, and Regular. Choose 'Install Font'. 

APHont is now ready to use!



Install on Microsoft Windows
----------------------------

Find the 'Fonts' directory on your hard drive. For example, C:/WINNT/Fonts/

If you already have an older version of APHont in this folder, delete it before installing this version. 

Copy four font files to your computer's font directory: Bold, Bold Italic, Italic, and Regular. 

APHont is now ready to use!
